name: Ruin Defender
description:
Try to survive on the cultist island. Every day resources will replenish on the island, while at night monsters come to attack

Made in about 48 hours as a game jam test

  • R - Convert life into mana
  • E - Interact with object under mouse
  • Esc - Quits the application while in game
  • Left Mouse - Shoot magic missile
  • Use the workbench on top of the island to craft obelisks
